bio.joined_at: Has been working as a manager at Nasha Tech LLC since 2019.
bio.experience: She graduated from University of Humanities Mongolia with a bachelor’s degree in Journalism and is currently pursuing a Master’s degree in Management Leadership from University of Humanities. She also studied at New College of Nottingham. Since age 17, she'd been worked as a journalist, marketing manager at the TM television for 10 years. Also, she's 2 years of experience as a PR manager and a marketing specialist at the Public Relations Department of Mongolian Mortgage Corporation (Housing Finance Company)
bio.additional: Experienced in Marketing planning, Facebook Ads, Social content creating.

facts.art: - Video commercial art director 🎬, loves commercial set preparing

bio.position: Founder of Nasha Tech LLC, Engineering team lead.
bio.experience: He graduated from Japan's University of Information and Communication with a degree in 'Information Technology Management' on a scholarship from the Government of Japan. Then he worked as a Fullstack Engineer for four years in Brainpad which is a digital marketing AI-based business in Japan, and returned to Mongolia in 2018 to establish Nasha Tech LLC.

facts.born: - Born and spent his childhood days in Bornuur sum Tov province 🏞️
facts.math: - Has a silver medal from the national math olympiad 🥈
facts.dance: - When he was a child he's a very talented dancer and also got a 'Talent' medal from The Children's Palace Mongolia 🕺
